text: Congrats to the nine physicians at UAMS for being named Healthcare Research All-Stars! 🎉👏 It's great to see the hard work and dedication of medical professionals recognized. The data-analytics platform's recognition of the UAMS Hip and Knee surgery team as top 1% nationwide is impressive, and the orthopaedic surgery team's ranking in the top 3% and gastrointestinal and general surgery teams' ranking in the top 5% nationwide is equally noteworthy. Keep up the amazing work! 💪🏼
